NewsItem.HEADLINE: CBRS Infrastructure and Devices 2017
NewsItem.SUMMARY: End-to-end analysis of the CBRS ecosystem and a clear view of how quickly it will develop. Technology, business, and political issues are all covered to assess the rise of this new wireless market segment.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The five-year forecast includes shipment, revenue, and other breakdowns of the market for CBRS access points. Device forecast includes handsets, CPEs, and IoT devices.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: CBRS small cell fwa fixed wireless citizens band radio service esc sas market forecast
